messages.message:
Hey all - I just received a unique request from a customer. "I would be interested in learning more about what Instabase is doing with word associations. Meaning, keywords that we would use to match a charge on an invoice. For example, 'Lock Charge,' 'Disposal,' and 'Fuel.' These are variable charges where we can usually not match by $ amount so word association would be the solution. I want to understand what the future looks like in being able to match."

Is this something that could be solved with AI Hub?

I built a deep learning model that I call an invoice line item classifier.  It takes the line item description and put it into a class (medical care, companion care, mileage, chores...)  Once classified the line item is processed by NM EOB module and the classification help determine if it is a payable item on the claim
